Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that the video shows people in Italy praying on the street, when in fact it was filmed in Brazil.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide any evidence or sources to back up the claim that people in Italy were praying on the street.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the video was filmed in Italy without verifying the location, leading to a false claim.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the video was actually filmed in Brazil, not Italy.
Falters at times: The claim falters by not verifying the accuracy of the video's location before making the claim.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim could have an alternative explanation that the person who shared it may have mistakenly believed it was filmed in Italy.
